name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S.
description: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S. is a leading telecommunications and technology services provider in Turkey and one of the largest in the region. Established in 1994, Turkcell has consistently been at the forefront of technological advancements, offering a wide range of services including mobile voice and data services, fixed line services, and broadband internet access. The company operates a robust 4G LTE network and has been a pioneer in the development of innovative digital services such as Turkcell TV+, a streaming service, and BİP, a messaging and communication platform. Turkcell has also made significant investments in infrastructure to support smart city projects and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions, aiming to enhance connectivity and digital transformation across various sectors. With a focus on customer satisfaction and technological innovation, Turkcell’s mission is to empower its customers through digital solutions that enhance their daily lives. The company is committed to sustainability, engaging in various initiatives to reduce its environmental footprint and promote social responsibility in the communities it serves.
